TopicTitle: Mod-Specific Kraken or twitchy docking ports? KSP 1.2?

Articles.Content:
So I came across this bug while building a base on Minmus. Everything was rosy and I racked up a 600 part base, then things started getting screwy. As part of the Umbra Space Industries modpack, I installed MKS. After that, seemingly at random and usually after I dock a new part, the base slowly start shaking from the end where the part was docked (few secs after "Physics Easing"), which gets more violent, parts get thrown around, explosions, you get the picture.

 

Totally did not know why this happened, but im an ardent saver, so always had multilple saves to reload. Usually, if I time warp for a few seconds or redock the same part after taking it off, the shaking dies down, but it's really annoying when it does happen. Then, when I started working on EPL, I removed MKS because I really didn't like the long resource chains, but the shaking stopped! There were a few hiccups, mostly due to incorrectly aligned docking ports or misplaced landing struts, but nothing as extravagant as my base exploding itself into orbit.
